mean_cn: n. 账户，原因，估价，利益；  vi. 报账，做出说明（或解释），为…负责，受罚；  vt. 认为，考虑
mean_en: an arrangement in which a bank keeps a record of the money that a person puts in and takes out of the bank
word_etyma: ac使 + count计算 → account 算账，账目
deformation_desc: 先生您要建立一个个人账户么？O和颠倒的U巧妙地组成了一个人
sentence: I have no money in my bank account.
sentence_trans: 我的银行账户里没钱啦。
